name: Sile 09
description:
Your old computer that you haven't used since 2009 has been infected with a Limewire virus! Get help from Sile to click and jump to stop the viruses before they infect your software and files!

HOW TO PLAY.

Tap the screen to move and release to jump.

This game features a remix of "Dreamscape" by "009 Sound System".

2 Player mode is exclusive to the Android version. You can find download links to them here, as well as downloads for the Windows version and alternate sites to play the game on!

https://Oditharge.com/Sile09
